dialogs.npcText:
Ooooh Ooh Oh.
 *The monkey turns to their partner, holding a long stick with several puncture holes. He seems ready to swing the stick at something.*
dialogs.firstText: [1] I will leave him too it.

dialogs.npcText:
*The monkey looks at you, apparently startled by your presence. Not a second later, a dart hits him in the arm* 
 Ahhh Eeek-Eeek!
